name: Baked Fish en Papillotte
keywords: bluefish fillet, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, main course
recipeIngredient: 1 square of kitchen parchment or aluminum foil, large enough to make a loose packet around the fish fillet

recipeInstructions.text: Use about a third of the olive oil to smear on the parchment or foil. Place the fillet on the oiled surface, and sprinkle the rest of the oil on top. Strew the lemon rind and capers over the top, and sprinkle with freshly ground pepper to taste.
Draw the sides and ends of the paper or foil up over the fish to form a loose packet. Crimp the edges together to make a tight seal.
Place the fish on a tray or cookie sheet. Place in the oven, and bake for 10 minutes. Serve the whole packet on a dinner plate; diners open their packets at table. Garnish with watercress.
